name: M@ke My Trip
description: In my trip you can explore each and every place in Paris in your budget specially . The special thing about my trip is that you can't get bored in my trip because there will be fun,adventure,curiosity,surprises and obviously an interesting trip. I can assured you that this trip will be one of your coolest and amazing trip in your life. The main reason to choose my trip because i am student by profession so i already visited almost every places in Paris several times so the best thing is you can make your trip epic in cheaper price.
